messages.subject: OT:  Sending Energy to Lisa's Family...
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Folks, I m forwarding this message to you from our local unschooling community, if you are interested. ... Also, many folks have contributed to Lisa s
messages.messageBody:
Hi Folks,

I'm forwarding this message to you from our local unschooling
community, if you are interested.

>Our small Sunday meditation group will be meeting
>again this Sunday, 3/2 at 6 pm EST to help Lisa along on
>her journey and give strength, love, support, a much
>needed gift of energy, etc., to Larry, Ruby & Roxanne.
>
>Please feel free to join us again "virtually" from
>where ever you are at about that time.

Also, many folks have contributed to Lisa's Memorial, and Larry,
Roxy, and Fire are very moved by all the messages and gifts they have
been receiving. If you're interested in posting or just reading, you
can find the memorial page at

http://lheyman.blogspot.com

By the way, if you have any photographs of Lisa you would like to
share from any of the conferences or any time, please do send
them. It would be wonderful to see her through your eyes. Send them
to me off list at:

marji @ gaiawolf . org (without the spaces).

Thank you again for all the wonderful messages and support.

In deepest gratitude,

Marji



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
